title: @Riot is MF's minor VU getting a halt/stop animation?
body: I know it isn't a big deal but i'm just wondering if she is because {{champion:12}} ,{{champion:38}}, and {{champion:57}} got the halt/stop animations on their Minor VU updates.  because from the previews it doesn't seem like she has one. Visually it seems smoother with one rather, than abruptly stopping after casting her spells and attacking.

replies.body:
Hiya CatSith! 

She does have one. She may not have had one when the videos were recorded, but she will have one when she goes live. :]

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=WzTptI6e,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-09T17:37:17.429+0000)
>
> Hiya CatSith! 
> 
> She does have one. She may not have had one when the videos were recorded, but she will have one when she goes live. :]

I dunno if you're the right person on asking this, but have you guys planned on updating her VO or just leaving her old one? 
Do you have plans to give her a recall animation as well?
We don't have plans to change her VO or give her a recall.

I'm ok with the VO, I like her laugh as it is. <3

I'm curious about the recall. Is it simply a basic case of resources? It's just odd that you do a visual upgrade and not include a recall. Feature creep has meant that any champion without a recall now just looks out of place today especially when recalling next to someone who does (and especially Pool Party Ziggs next to the rest of the line :S ). It's extra odd that you guys are happy to spend the resources to give new skins their own unique recalls yet leave these other champs without a recall at all even when giving them touchups which would seem like the perfect opportunity to add one in (seriously if she even needs one MF won't be getting a full blown VU for years and years and years from now so this would be like the only opportunity to do so :/ ).
Since its a Minor VU, she won't get a VO or Recall.
